Authentic human connection. 
It's like being with your friends in the same room.

DoTalk - is a chrome extension that allows you to talk with your friends while surfing the web.

How it works
1. You and your friends install the extension
2. Visit the same URL at the same time
3. Enable live chat and you'll be able to hear each other.

That's it. Go and have fun.
